regen.new_specification: The system shall log unauthorized access attempts to ensure security and auditing capabilities.

regen.absent_element: specification for logging unauthorized access attempts
regen.new_specification: Any unauthorized access attempt should be logged in the system.
The system shall log any unauthorized access attempts, including details of the user attempting access and the targeted records.

label: Unauthorised attempts to access cases must be logged in the audit trail.
absence: action of logging of unauthorised attempts to access
